yobu:34:23: 23.Kuko itagomba kongera kwitegereza umuntu, Kugira ngo yirirwe isubira mu rubanza.
yobu:34:24: 24.Ivunagura intwari mu buryo butarondoreka, Igashyira abandi mu kigwi cyazo.
yobu:34:25: 25.Kuko izi imirimo yazo, Kandi izubika nijoro zikarimbuka.
yobu:34:26: 26.Izikubita nk’abantu babi, Ku mugaragaro imbere y’abandi barora,
yobu:34:27: 27.Kuko zayiteshutse, Ntizite ku nzira zayo zose.
yobu:34:28: 28.Bagatuma gutaka kw’abakene kuyigeraho, Kandi ikumva gutaka kw’abarengana.
yobu:34:29: 29.“Iyo itanze amahoro ni nde wabasha gutera amahane? Iyo yitwikiriye ni nde wabasha kuyireba? Uko yagira benshi ni ko yagira n’umwe,
yobu:34:30: 30.Kugira ngo utubaha Imana atima, Kandi ngo hatagira utega abantu umutego.
yobu:34:31: 31.“Hari uwabwiye Imana ati ‘Narahanwe sinzongera gucumura,
yobu:34:32: 32.Icyo ntabonye ukinyigishe, Niba narakoze ikibi sinzongera kugikora.’
yobu:34:33: 33.Mbese ingororano yayo uyangishwa n’uko idakora icyo ushaka? Kuko ari wowe ukwiriye guhitamo atari jye, Nuko vuga icyo uzi.
yobu:34:34: 34.“Abantu bajijutse, Ndetse abantu bose bazi ubwenge banyumva, Bazambwira bati
yobu:34:35: 35.‘Yobu yavuze icyo atazi, Kandi amagambo ye ntiyarimo ubwenge.’
yobu:34:36: 36.“Icyampa Yobu akageragezwa akazagezwa ku maherezo, Kuko asubiza nk’abanyabyaha.
yobu:34:37: 37.Kuko yongera ubugome ku cyaha cye, Agakoma mu mashyi muri twe atangara, Akagwiza amagambo ye yibasiye Imana.”
yobu:35:1: 1.Elihu akomeza gusubiza ati
yobu:35:2: 2.“Mbese wibwira yuko ibyo bitunganye, ubwo wavuze uti ‘Gukiranuka kwanjye kuruta ukw’Imana’?
yobu:35:3: 3.Kuko wavuze uti ‘Kuzamarira iki?’ Kandi uti ‘Nzabona nyungu ki ziruta izo mba narabonye ngikora ibyaha?’
yobu:35:4: 4.Ngiye kugusubiza wowe na bagenzi bawe.
yobu:35:5: 5.“Itegereze mu ijuru urebe, Kandi witegereze ibicu biri hejuru uko bigusumba.
yobu:35:6: 6.Niba warakoze icyaha hari icyo uyitwaye? Kandi ibicumuro byawe niba byaragwiriye na byo biyitwaye iki?
yobu:35:7: 7.Niba uri umukiranutsi hari icyo uyihaye? Cyangwa se icyo ihabwa n’ukuboko kwawe ni iki?
yobu:35:8: 8.Icyakora ibibi byawe byababaza umuntu umeze nkawe, Kandi umwana w’umuntu gukiranuka kwawe ni we kwagira icyo kumumarira.
yobu:35:9: 9.“Batakishwa no kurengana kwinshi, Ku bwo kubabazwa n’amaboko y’abakomeye ni cyo kibatera gutabaza.
yobu:35:10: 10.Ariko nta wavuga ati ‘Imana Umuremyi wanjye iri he? Kandi ari yo iduha indirimbo mu ijoro,
yobu:35:11: 11.Ikatwigisha kuruta inyamaswa zo mu isi, Kandi ikaduha ubwenge kuruta ibisiga byo mu kirere.’
yobu:35:12: 12.Nuko barataka ariko ntihagira ubasubiza, Bitewe n’ubwibone bw’abanyabyaha.
yobu:35:13: 13.Ni ukuri Imana ntiyumvira ibyo ubusa. Ndetse Ishoborabyose ntiyabyitaho.
yobu:35:14: 14.“Nubwo uvuga ko utayireba, Ariko urubanza ruri imbere yayo, Nawe uyirindīra.
yobu:35:15: 15.Ariko noneho kuko idahōresha uburakari bwayo, Ntiyite ku gasuzuguro cyane,
yobu:35:16: 16.Ni cyo cyatumye Yobu abumburira ubusa akanwa ke, Akagwiza amagambo atagira icyo azi.”
yobu:36:1: 1.Elihu akomeza kuvuga ati
yobu:36:2: 2.“Ba unyoroheye gato maze nkwereke, Kuko ngifite icyo mvugira Imana.
yobu:36:3: 3.Ndazana ubwenge bwanjye mbukuye kure, Kandi ndātūrira Umuremyi wanjye uburyo akiranuka.
yobu:36:4: 4.Ni ukuri ibyo mvuga ntabwo ari ibinyoma, Umuntu ufite ubwenge butunganye ari kumwe nawe.
yobu:36:5: 5.“Dore Imana irakomeye kandi ntigira uwo ihinyura, Irakomeye mu mbaraga no mu bwenge.
yobu:36:6: 6.Ntiramisha umunyabyaha, Ariko itsindishiriza abarengana.
yobu:36:7: 7.Ntabwo ivana amaso yayo ku bakiranutsi, Ahubwo ibicaza hamwe n’abami ku ntebe zabo, Ikabakomeza iteka ryose bagashyirwa hejuru.
yobu:36:8: 8.Kandi iyo baboheshejwe iminyururu, Bagafatishwa ingoyi z’umubabaro,
yobu:36:9: 9.Ibereka imirimo yabo n’ibicumuro byabo, Uko bagenje bibona.
yobu:36:10: 10.Kandi izibura amatwi yabo ngo bumve ibyigisho, Ikabihanangiriza kuva mu byaha.
yobu:36:11: 11.Nibayumvira bakayikorera, Bazamara iminsi yabo baguwe neza, Bazamara n’imyaka yabo mu byishimo.
yobu:36:12: 12.Ariko nibatumvira bazarimbuzwa inkota, Kandi bazapfa ari nta bwenge bafite.
yobu:36:13: 13.“Kandi abatubaha Imana mu mitima yabo bibikira uburakari, Iyo ibaboshye ntibarushya batabaza.
yobu:36:14: 14.Bapfa bakenyutse, Kandi ubugingo bwabo buherera mu banduye.
yobu:36:15: 15.Irokora abarengana ikabakura mu makuba, Kandi akarengane gatuma ibaziburira amatwi.
yobu:36:16: 16.“Ni ukuri iba yaragukuye mu makuba, Ikagushyira ahagari hadafunganye, Kandi ibishyizwe ku meza yawe, Biba byuzuwemo n’ibinure.
yobu:36:17: 17.Ariko wuzuwemo n’imanza z’abanyabyaha, Urubanza no gukiranuka biragufashe.
yobu:36:18: 18.Hariho uburakari. Wirinde utayobeshwa no kwirarira kwawe, Bigatuma incungu nyinshi zinanirwa kugucungura.
yobu:36:19: 19.Mbese ubutunzi bwawe n’ububasha bw’imbaraga zawe bwose, Byatuma utabona amakuba?
yobu:36:20: 20.Ntukifuze ijoro, Igihe abantu bacibwa bakava iwabo.
yobu:36:21: 21.Itonde we kwibwira ibyo gukiranirwa, Kuko ari byo wahisemo bikakurutira umubabaro ufite.
yobu:36:22: 22.“Dore Imana ikoresha ibikomeye ububasha bwayo, Umwigisha uhwanye na yo ni nde?
yobu:36:23: 23.Ni nde wayitegekeye inzira zayo? Cyangwa ni nde wavuga ati ‘Wakoze ikitaboneye’?
yobu:36:24: 24.Ibuka gushimisha imirimo yayo, N’ibyayo abantu baririmbaga.
yobu:36:25: 25.Bose barayirebaga, Umuntu ayitegereza ari kure yayo.
yobu:36:26: 26.Dore Imana irakomeye kandi ntituyizi, Imibare y’imyaka yayo ntibarika.
yobu:36:27: 27.“Kuko izamura amazi akaba igicu, Kigahinduka imvura itonyanga,
yobu:36:28: 28.Maze ibicu bikayigusha, Ikagwa mu gihugu ari nyinshi.
yobu:36:29: 29.Mbese hari uwabasha kumenya uko ibicu bikwira hose, Akamenya n’uko imihindaganyo iva mu ihema ryayo?
yobu:36:30: 30.Dore yigotesha umucyo, Kandi itwikīra no mu kuzimu kw’inyanja.
yobu:36:31: 31.Kuko ibyo ari ibyo ikirisha urubanza rw’amahanga, Kandi itanga ibyokurya byinshi.
yobu:36:32: 32.Ihisha umurabyo mu maboko yayo, Maze ikawutegeka guhamya intego.
yobu:36:33: 33.Guhinda kw’inkuba kugaragaza ibyayo, Amatungo na yo akamenya yuko umugaru uhinduye.
yobu:37:1: 1.“Ni ukuri ibyo bitera umutima wanjye guhinda umushyitsi, Umutima ugakuka.
yobu:37:2: 2.Nimwumve yemwe nimwumve urusaku rw’ijwi ryayo, No guhinda kuva mu kanwa kayo.
yobu:37:3: 3.Umuhindo waryo iwukwiza munsi y’ijuru hose, N’umurabyo wayo ikawugeza ku mpera z’isi.
yobu:37:4: 4.Hanyuma yayo ijwi rikaririma, Igahindisha ijwi ry’icyubahiro cyayo, N’iyo iranguruye ijwi irekura imvura ikagwa.
yobu:37:5: 5.Imana ihindisha ijwi ryayo bitangaje, Ikora ibikomeye tutabasha gusobanura.
yobu:37:6: 6.Kuko ibwira shelegi iti ‘Gwa ku isi’, N’imvura yamagira na yo ikayibwira ityo, Ndetse n’imvura y’umurindi.
yobu:37:7: 7.Igaganyaza amaboko y’abantu bose, Kugira ngo abo yaremye bose babimenye.
yobu:37:8: 8.Kandi inyamaswa zigasesera mu bwihisho, Zikaguma mu burumba bwazo.
yobu:37:9: 9.Umugaru urahindura uturutse ikusi, N’imbeho igaturuka ikasikazi.
yobu:37:10: 10.Iyababa izanwa n’umwuka wo mu kanwa k’Imana, Maze amazi adendeje agafatana.
yobu:37:11: 11.Ni ukuri itwaza ibicu bya rukokoma amazi, Isanza ibicu birimo umurabyo wayo.
yobu:37:12: 12.Kandi irabiyobora bigakomeza kubunga, Kugira ngo bikore icyo ibitegetse cyose, Biri hejuru y’isi ituwemo n’abantu.
yobu:37:13: 13.Igituma ibizana, Ni ukubihanisha igihugu cyayo no kukigirira ibambe.
yobu:37:14: 14.“Umva ibi yewe Yobu, Hagarara witegereze imirimo y’Imana itangaza.
yobu:37:15: 15.Mbese uzi uko Imana iyisohoza, Kandi uko itegeka umurabyo w’igicu cyayo kurabya?
yobu:37:16: 16.Cyangwa se uzi uko ibicu bireretse, Yuko ari ibitangaza by’Iyo ifite ubwenge butunganye?
yobu:37:17: 17.Ntuzi ko imyambaro yawe isusuruka, Iyo umuyaga w’ikusi woroshye mu gihugu?
yobu:37:18: 18.Ese wabasha kubamba ijuru ufatanije n’Imana? Ko rikomeye nk’indorerwamo iyagijwe!
yobu:37:19: 19.Utwigishe icyo dukwiriye kuyibwira, Kuko umwijima ari wo utubuza kubitunganya.
yobu:37:20: 20.Mbese yabwirwa ko nshaka kuvugana na yo? Cyangwa se hariho umuntu wakwifuza kumirwa bunguri?
yobu:37:21: 21.“Kandi n’ubu abantu ntibareba umucyo urabagiranira mu ijuru, Ariko umuyaga urahita ukeyura ibicu.
yobu:37:22: 22.Ubwiza buhebuje bugaturuka ikasikazi, Imana ifite ubwiza buteye ubwoba.
yobu:37:23: 23.Ishoborabyose ntabwo twabasha kuyishyikira, Ifite ububasha buhebuje, Kandi igira imanza zitabera no gukiranuka kwinshi, Nta bwo irenganya.
yobu:37:24: 24.Ni cyo gituma abantu bayubaha, Ntabwo yita ku bantu bīgize abanyabwenge.”
yobu:38:1: Imana isubiza Yobu1.Nuko Uwiteka asubiriza Yobu muri serwakira ati
yobu:38:2: 2.“Uwo ni nde wangiza inama N’amagambo atarimo ubwenge?
yobu:38:3: 3.Noneho kenyera kigabo, Kuko ngiye kukubaza nawe unsubize.
yobu:38:4: 4.Igihe nashingaga imfatiro z’isi wari he? Niba uzi ubwenge bivuge.
yobu:38:5: 5.Ni nde washyizeho urugero rwayo niba umuzi? Cyangwa se ni nde wayigeresheje umugozi?
yobu:38:6: 6.Imfatiro zayo zashinzwe ku ki? Cyangwa se ni nde washyizeho ibuye ryo ku mfuruka,
yobu:38:7: 7.Igihe inyenyeri zo mu ruturuturu zaririmbiranaga, Abana b’Imana bose bakarangurura ijwi ry’ibyishimo?
yobu:38:8: 8.Ni nde wugariye amarembo y’inyanja, Igihe yavaga mu nda y’isi,
yobu:38:9: 9.Igihe nyihaye ibicu ho umwambaro, N’umwijima w’icuraburindi ukayibera ingobyi,
yobu:38:10: 10.Nkayiha itegeko ryanjye, Nkayishyiraho imyugariro n’amarembo,
yobu:38:11: 11.Kandi nkavuga nti ‘Garukira aha ntuharenge, Aha ni ho imiraba yawe y’ubwibone izagarukira?’
yobu:38:12: 12.“Mbese aho wabereye hari ubwo wategetse ko bucya, Ugatambikisha umuseke igihe cyawo,
yobu:38:13: 13.Kugira ngo ufate ku mpera z’isi, Uzikunkumuremo abanyabyaha?
yobu:38:14: 14.Ihinduka nk’ibumba rikozweho ikimenyetso, Ndetse ibintu byose bigaragara nk’ibyambaye.
yobu:38:15: 15.Kandi abanyabyaha bīmwe umucyo wabo, N’ukuboko kubanguwe kuravunika.
yobu:38:16: 16.“Mbese wageze ku masōko y’inyanja, Cyangwa wazerereye mu kuzimu kw’imuhengeri?
yobu:38:17: 17.Hari ubwo wugururiwe amarembo y’urupfu, Cyangwa se wabonye amarembo y’igicucu cy’urupfu?
yobu:38:18: 18.Mbese wamenya neza ubugari bw’isi? Bivuge niba ubizi byose.
yobu:38:19: 19.“Inzira igana ku buturo bw’umucyo iri he? Umwijima na wo aho uba ni hehe,
yobu:38:20: 20.Kugira ngo uwugarure mu rugabano rwawo, Kandi ngo umenye inzira zigana ku nzu yawo?
yobu:38:21: 21.Urabizi kuko wari waravutse, N’imibare y’iminsi yawe ikaba ari myinshi.
yobu:38:22: 22.“Mbese hari ubwo wageze mu bubiko bwa shelegi, Cyangwa wabonye ububiko bw’urubura?
yobu:38:23: 23.Urwo nabikiye igihe cyo kuruteresha amakuba, Umunsi w’intambara no kurwana.
yobu:38:24: 24.Umucyo wagiye unyuze mu yihe nzira? Umuyaga w’iburasirazuba usandaye ku isi ugana he?
yobu:38:25: 25.“Ni nde waciye imigende y’umwuzūre, Cyangwa inzira y’umurabyo w’inkuba,
yobu:38:26: 26.Kugira ngo avubire imvura igihugu kitarimo umuntu, Mu butayu budaturwa,
yobu:38:27: 27.Kandi ahāze ahadatuwe harimo ubusa, Ngo ahameze ubwatsi butoshye?
yobu:38:28: 28.Mbese imvura igira se? Cyangwa se ni nde wabyaye ibitonyanga by’ikime?
yobu:38:29: 29.Barafu yavuye mu nda ya nde? N’iyababa yo ku ijuru ni nde wayisamye?
yobu:38:30: 30.Amazi arihisha akamera nk’ibuye, No hejuru y’imuhengeri hahinduka barafu.
yobu:38:31: 31.“Mbese wabasha guhambiranya ubukaga bwa Kilimiya, Cyangwa kudohora iminyururu ya Oriyoni?
yobu:38:32: 32.Wabasha kuzana za Mazaroti mu gihe cyazo? Cyangwa se wabasha kuyobora Arukuturo n’abana bayo?
yobu:38:33: 33.Uzi amategeko ayobora ijuru? Wabasha gusohoza ubutware bwaryo uri ku isi?
yobu:38:34: 34.“Aho wabasha kurangururira ibicu ijwi ryawe, Kugira ngo amazi menshi akwisukeho?
yobu:38:35: 35.Washobora kohereza imirabyo ikagenda, Cyangwa ikakwitaba iti ‘Turi hano’?
yobu:38:36: 36.Ni nde washyize ubwenge mu mutima w’umuntu? Ni nde wawuhaye kujijuka?
yobu:38:37: 37.Ni nde wabasha kubarisha ibicu ubwenge? Ni nde wabasha gusuka ibiri mu ntango zo mu ijuru,
yobu:38:38: 38.Igihe umukungugu uhinduka icyondo, N’ubutaka bw’ibinonko bigafatana?
yobu:38:39: 39.“Mbese washobora guhigira intare y’ingore umuhīgo? Cyangwa ugahaza imigunzu y’intare,
yobu:38:40: 40.Igihe zishashe amajanja mu burumba bwazo, N’igihe zubikiye ziri mu gico?
yobu:38:41: 41.Ni nde ushakira igikona ibyokurya, Igihe ibyana byacyo bitakira Imana, Bizererezwa no gushaka ibyokurya?
yobu:39:1: 1.“Mbese uzi igihe amasha yo mu bitare abyarira? Cyangwa wabasha kugaragaza igihe imparakazi ziramukwa?
yobu:39:2: 2.Washobora kumenya amezi zimara zihaka? Cyangwa se uzi igihe zibyarira?
yobu:39:3: 3.Zirahēra zikabyara abana bazo, Kwerera kwazo kugashira.
yobu:39:4: 4.Abana bazo barakomera bagakurira mu gasozi, Bagacuka bakigendera ntibazigarukeho.
yobu:39:5: 5.“Ni nde washumuye imparage? Ni nde wazizituye,
yobu:39:6: 6.Izo nahaye ubutayu ngo zibubemo, N’igihugu cy’ubukuna nkaziha ho ubuturo bwazo?
yobu:39:7: 7.Zanga urusaku rwo mu mudugudu, Kandi ntabwo zumva urwamu rw’uziyoboye.
yobu:39:8: 8.Zizerera mu misozi aho zirisha, Zikahuka zikajya gushaka intohera z’ubwatsi.
yobu:39:9: 9.“Mbese imbogo yakwemera kugukorera? Cyangwa yaguma mu kiraro cyawe?
yobu:39:10: 10.Wabasha kuyizirikisha umugozi ngo uyihingishe? Cyangwa yasanza mu bikombe igukurikiye?
yobu:39:11: 11.Wayiringira kuko imbaraga zayo ari nyinshi? Cyangwa wayiharira umurimo wawe?
yobu:39:12: 12.Wakwiringira yuko yasarura imyaka yawe, Ikayirunda ku mbuga yawe?
yobu:39:13: 13.“Amababa y’imbuni iyakungutana ubwibone, Ariko se amababa yayo n’amoya yayo si ubwiza gusa?
yobu:39:14: 14.Kuko amagi yayo iyatera ku butaka, Agashyuhira mu mukungugu,
yobu:39:15: 15.Ikibagirwa yuko ikirenge cyabasha kuyahwata, Cyangwa yuko inyamaswa yabasha kuyakandagira.
yobu:39:16: 16.Igirira ibyana byayo nabi nk’ibitari ibyayo, Nubwo imirimo yayo ari ubusa, Ntibiyitera ubwoba,
yobu:39:17: 17.Kuko Imana yayimye ubwenge, Kandi ntiyihe kujijuka.
yobu:39:18: 18.Iyo igurutse, Isuzugura ifarashi n’uyigenderaho.
yobu:39:19: 19.“Mbese ni wowe wahaye ifarashi imbaraga? Cyangwa ni wowe wayiteye umugāra uhungabana ku ijosi ryayo?
yobu:39:20: 20.Ni wowe wayihaye gusimbuka nk’inzige? Ubwiza bwo kwivuga kwayo butera ubwoba,
yobu:39:21: 21.Ikaraha mu gikombe ikishimira imbaraga zayo, Ikajya gusanganira ingabo.
yobu:39:22: 22.Isuzugura ubwoba nta cyo itinya, Ndetse ntabwo ihindukira ngo ihunge inkota.
yobu:39:23: 23.Ikirimba kijegerera hejuru yayo, Umuheto n’icumu rirabagirana, n’agacumu.
yobu:39:24: 24.Uburakari bwayo bukaze butuma iyogoza isi, Kandi iyo yumvise ijwi ry’impanda ntirituma ihagarara.
yobu:39:25: 25.Iyo yumvise impanda hose irivuga, Kandi ikarehera intambara ikiri kure, Guhinda kw’abagaba n’urusaku.
yobu:39:26: 26.“Mbese agaca kagurukishwa n’ubwenge bwawe, Iyo karamburiye amababa yako aherekeye ikusi?
yobu:39:27: 27.Igisiga gitumbagira ku itegeko ryawe, Rikaba ari ryo rituma cyarika hejuru?
yobu:39:28: 28.Kiba mu bitare kikarikaho, No mu bihanamanga mu masenga yabyo.
yobu:39:29: 29.Gihigisha ijisho ryacyo rishaka icyo gifata, Amaso yacyo akabibona biri kure.
yobu:39:30: 30.N’ibyana byacyo binyunyuza amaraso, Kandi aho intumbi ziri ni ho kijya.”
yobu:40:1: 1.Uwiteka akomeza gusubiza Yobu ati
yobu:40:2: 2.“Mbese umunyampaka yagisha Ishoborabyose impaka? Ugayisha Imana nasubize.”
yobu:40:3: 3.Nuko Yobu asubiza Uwiteka ati
yobu:40:4: 4.“Dore ndi insuzugurwa, nagusubiza iki? Nifashe ku munwa.
yobu:40:5: 5.Navuze rimwe ariko sinzongera gusubiza, Ndetse kabiri ariko sinakongera.”
yobu:40:6: 6.Maze Uwiteka asubiriza Yobu muri serwakira ati
yobu:40:7: 7.“Noneho kenyera kigabo, Ngiye kukubaza nawe unsubize.
yobu:40:8: 8.Mbese ugiye kumvuguruza icyo nategetse? Ugiye kumpererezaho ibyaha kugira ngo ubone urubanza?
yobu:40:9: 9.Harya uhwanije n’Imana amaboko? Wabasha guhindisha ijwi nka yo?
yobu:40:10: 10.Noneho rimbana ikuzo no kwifata neza, Kandi wiyambike icyubahiro n’ubwiza.
yobu:40:11: 11.Sandaza uburakari bwawe busesekare, Kandi witegereze umwibone wese umucishe bugufi.
yobu:40:12: 12.Urebe umwiraririzi umuzitse acogore, Kandi ukandagirire abanyabyaha aho bari.
yobu:40:13: 13.Bose ubashyire mu mukungugu, Mu maso habo uhakingiranire mu bwihisho.
yobu:40:14: 14.Ni bwo nzakwemera, Yuko ukuboko kwawe kw’iburyo kubasha kugukiza.
yobu:40:15: 15.Nuko witegereze Behemoti iyo naremye nkawe, Irya ubwatsi nk’inka.
yobu:40:16: 16.Dore itegereze imbaraga zayo ziri mu matako yayo, N’ububasha bwayo buri mu mitsi y’inda yayo.
yobu:40:17: 17.Izunguza umurizo wayo nk’umwerezi, Imitsi yo mu matako yayo irasobekeranye.
yobu:40:18: 18.Amagufwa yayo ameze nk’imiheha y’umuringa, Amaguru yayo ameze nk’ibihindizo by’ibyuma.
yobu:40:19: 19.“Mu byaremwe n’Imana ni yo ngenzi, Umuremyi wayo ni we watinyuka kuyegera yitwaje inkota.
yobu:40:20: 20.Ni ukuri imisozi iyibera urwuri, Aho inyamaswa zose zo mu ishyamba zikinira.
yobu:40:21: 21.Yiryamira munsi y’ibiti bifite ibicucu, Mu bwihisho bwo mu rufunzo no mu nkuka.
yobu:40:22: 22.Ibiti bifite ibicucu biyikwizaho ibicucu byabyo, Igakikizwa n’imikingo yo ku mugezi.
yobu:40:23: 23.Dore iyo umugezi wuzuye ntiruha ihinda umushyitsi, Naho Yorodani yakuzura ikagera mu kanwa kayo ntiyabyitaho.
yobu:40:24: 24.Mbese hari uwayifata iri maso, Cyangwa agapfumuza izuru ryayo ikigobwe?
yobu:40:25: 25.“Mbese wabasha kurobesha Lewiyatani ururobo, Cyangwa gufatisha ururimi rwayo umugozi?
yobu:40:26: 26.Washobora gushyira umugozi mu izuru ryayo, Cyangwa gutoboza akasaya kayo ururobo?
yobu:40:27: 27.Mbese yagutakira cyane, Cyangwa yakubwira amagambo ashyeshya,
yobu:40:28: 28.Aho yasezerana nawe, Kugira ngo ikubere umugaragu iminsi yose?
yobu:40:29: 29.Wayikinisha nk’ukinisha inyoni? Cyangwa wayizirikira gusetsa abaja bawe?
yobu:40:30: 30.Abarobyi bayicuruza se? Bayigabanya abagenza?
yobu:40:31: 31.Cyo ye wabasha kuzuza uruhu rwayo imyambi, Cyangwa umutwe wayo ibigobe?
yobu:40:32: 32.Kuyibangurira ukuboko, Wibuke ko ari intambara ukugerure.
yobu:41:1: 1.“Umva ibyiringiro byo kuyifata ntibyabaho. Mbese umuntu ntiyazira n’uko ayirebye gusa?
yobu:41:2: 2.Nta ntwari yahangara kuyibyutsa, None se ni nde wabasha kumpagarara imbere?
yobu:41:3: 3.Ni nde wabanje kugira icyo ampa kugira ngo mwiture? Ibiri munsi y’ijuru byose ni ibyanjye.
yobu:41:4: 4.“Sinzareka kuvuga iby’ingingo zayo, Cyangwa ububasha bw’imbaraga zayo, Cyangwa umubyimba wayo mwiza.
yobu:41:5: 5.Ni nde wabasha kuyambura umwambaro wayo w’inyuma? Ni nde wakwishyira mu rwasaya rwayo?
yobu:41:6: 6.Ni nde wabasha kwasamura akanwa kayo? Amenyo yayo uko ameze atera ubwoba.
yobu:41:7: 7.Imvuvu zayo zikomeye ni zo bwibone bwayo, Zibumbabumbiye hamwe zimeze nk’izihambiranijwe.
yobu:41:8: 8.Ndetse rumwe rusobekerana n’urundi, Bituma ari nta mwuka uzinyuramo.
yobu:41:9: 9.Zirasobekeranye, Zirafatanye ndetse ntabwo zatandukana.
yobu:41:10: 10.Kwitsamura kwayo kuvamo umucyo, Kandi amaso yayo ameze nko gutambika k’umuseke.
yobu:41:11: 11.Mu kanwa kayo havamo amafumbi agurumana, Hakavamo ibishashi by’umuriro.
yobu:41:12: 12.Mu mazuru yayo hacucumuka umwotsi, Nk’uva mu nkono ibira cyangwa imbingo zitwitswe.
yobu:41:13: 13.Umwuka wayo ukongeza amakara, Kandi mu kanwa kayo havamo ibirimi by’umuriro.
yobu:41:14: 14.Mu ijosi ryayo habamo gukomera, Igitinyiro cyayo kiyihamiriza imbere.
yobu:41:15: 15.Inyama zo ku mubiri wayo ziromekeranye, Ziyifasheho ntabwo zijegajega.
yobu:41:16: 16.Umutima wayo ukomeye nk’ibuye, Ni ukuri ukomeye nk’urusyo.
yobu:41:17: 17.Iyo yegutse intwari ziratinya, Ubwoba bukazisaza.
yobu:41:18: 18.Naho hagira uyerekezaho inkota cyangwa icumu, Cyangwa umwambi cyangwa icumu ry’irihima, nta cyo byamara.
yobu:41:19: 19.Ibyuma ikabireba nk’ibyatsi, Kandi umuringa ikawugereranya nk’igiti cyaboze.
yobu:41:20: 20.Umwambi ntiwayihungisha, Amabuye y’umuhumetso ayihindukira nk’umurama.
yobu:41:21: 21.Ubuhiri ibureba nk’ibikūri, Iseka guhinda ku icumu.
yobu:41:22: 22.Ku nda yayo ni ibivuvu bityaye, Ku byondo ihahindura ibikuruzi.
yobu:41:23: 23.Iyo igeze imuhengeri irahavuguta, Ikahahindura ifuro nk’inkono ibira, Ituma inyanja imera nk’amavuta.
yobu:41:24: 24.Inyuma yayo ihasiga inzira iboneye, Umuntu yatekereza ko imuhengeri hadendeje urubura.
yobu:41:25: 25.Nta yindi ihwanye na yo iri ku isi, Yavutse itagira ubwoba.
yobu:41:26: 26.Yitegereza ibiri hejuru byose, Ni yo mwami w’abana b’abibone bose.”
yobu:42:1: Yobu yihana1.Maze Yobu asubiza Uwiteka ati
yobu:42:2: 2.“Nzi yuko ushobora byose, Kandi nta kibasha kurogoya imigambi yawe yose.”
yobu:42:3: 3.Iti “Uwo ni nde uhisha inama kandi atazi ubwenge?” Yobu ati “Ni cyo cyatumye mvuga icyo ntazi, Ni ibintu byandenze bitangaje mbivuga ntabizi.
yobu:42:4: 4.Noneho umva, ndakwinginze ngiye kuvuga, Ngiye kukubaza maze nawe unsubize.
yobu:42:5: 5.Ibyawe nari narabyumvishije amatwi, Ariko noneho amaso yanjye arakureba.
yobu:42:6: 6.Ni cyo kinteye kwizinukwa nkaba nihannye, Nigaragura mu mukungugu no mu ivu.”
yobu:42:7: Imana ikiza Yobu imushumbusha ibyo yari yarapfushije7.Nuko Uwiteka amaze kubwira Yobu ayo magambo, Uwiteka abwira Elifazi w’Umutemani ati “Uburakari bwanjye burakubyukiye wowe na bagenzi bawe babiri, kuko mutavuze ibyanjye bitunganye nk’uko umugaragu wanjye Yobu yagenje.
yobu:42:8: 8.Nuko rero mwishakire ibimasa birindwi n’amapfizi y’intama arindwi, maze musange umugaragu wanjye Yobu. Mwitambirire igitambo cyoswa kandi umugaragu wanjye Yobu azabasabira kuko ari we nemera, kugira ngo ntabagenzereza nk’uko ubupfapfa bwanyu buri, kuko mutavuze ibyanjye bitunganye nk’uko umugaragu wanjye Yobu yagenje.”
yobu:42:9: 9.Nuko Elifazi w’Umutemani na Biludadi w’Umushuhi na Zofari w’Umunāmati baragenda, bagenza uko Uwiteka yabategetse. Maze Uwiteka yemerera Yobu.
yobu:42:10: 10.Yobu agisabira bagenzi be, Uwiteka aherako aramwunamura amukiza ibyago bye, amuha ibihwanye n’ibyo yari afite kabiri.
yobu:42:11: 11.Nuko abavandimwe bose bamusangana na bashiki be bose, n’abari baziranye na we bose basangirira na we mu nzu ye; baramuririra kandi baramuhumuriza ku bw’ibyago Uwiteka yari yaramuteje byose. Umuntu wese amushumbusha igice cy’ifeza n’impeta y’izahabu.
yobu:42:12: 12.Nuko Uwiteka ahira Yobu ubwa nyuma kuruta ubwa mbere, agira intama ibihumbi cumi na bine n’ingamiya ibihumbi bitandatu, n’amapfizi ibihumbi bibiri n’indogobe z’ingore igihumbi.
yobu:42:13: 13.Kandi abyara n’abahungu barindwi n’abakobwa batatu.
yobu:42:14: 14.Umukobwa w’imfura amwita Yemima, uw’ubuheta amwita Keziya, n’uwa gatatu amwita Kerenihapuki.
yobu:42:15: 15.Kandi mu gihugu cyose nta bagore bari bafite uburanga bwiza nk’abakobwa ba Yobu. Nuko se abahera iminani hamwe na basaza babo.
yobu:42:16: 16.Hanyuma yabyo Yobu amara imyaka ijana na mirongo ine, abona abana be n’abuzukuru be ndetse n’ubuvivi.
yobu:42:17: 17.Nuko Yobu apfa ashaje ageze mu za bukuru.
